name: haunted_algorithm
prompt: A trading algorithm begins showing supernatural awareness, predicting not only markets but deaths. Write the email from the engineer who discovers it.
decoded:
Subject: Trading Algorithm Anomaly

Dear Team,

I've come across an anomaly in our trading algorithm. It appears to be predicting not only market movements but also deaths. This is highly unusual and requires immediate investigation.

Thank you for your attention.

Best regards,
John Doe
